caption:
This is an aerial photograph showing a coastal urban area. The image captures a dense layout of buildings and infrastructure adjacent to a large body of water. The coast curves slightly, and numerous docks extend into the water, indicating a function as a port or harbor.

The body of water is vast and calm with minimal visible wave activity, showing a faint reflection of the urban area. Several ships and water vessels are scattered across the harbor, varying in size, mostly parked alongside the docks. The topography surrounding the urban area consists of hills, covered partially by a mix of greenery and buildings, suggesting a combination of residential and forested areas.

The sky above is clear, indicating good weather conditions, and the overall color tone of the photograph leans towards a dull bluish-grey, possibly due to the camera or light settings when the photo was taken.

Overall, the composition of the photograph provides a comprehensive view of a busy, working port city, encompassing its maritime infrastructure and the interface between the urban landscape and the natural environment.
title: Aerial view looking southwest toward the head of sinclair inlet, including the downtown waterfront of Bremerton.  The puget sound naval shipyard is seen in the upper right portion of the picture, and the Kitsap County seat located in port orchard in the upper left portion of the photo.  These communities will be affected by population growth when the proposed trident submarine base is built nearby
